registerStart.text: O-oh, hello there!  I'm Ralsei, the fluffy caretaker of this nursery!\nI'm so happy to meet you!I'll be sure to take good care of you,\nso don't worry, okay?

alreadyRegistered.text: Oh!  It looks like you're already registered here!

littleAge.text: So I can better take care of you, could you tell me your little age?

littleAgeConfirm.text: Thank you for telling me!\nI'll be sure to keep that in mind while I take care of you!

name.text: Oh, and do you have a name you'd like me to call you?

nameConfirm.text: Nice to meet you, [name]!\nI'll be sure to remember that!

diaper247Check.text: Umm, this might be a little personal, but do you wear diapers 24/7?\n\nOr just sometimes?

diaper247NoDiapers.text: You just wear diapers sometimes, huh?\nThat's okay, I'll be sure to keep that in mind!

diaper247Confirm.text: I see! Thank you for telling me!

currentDiaper.text: I-if you don't mind me asking, what kind of diaper are you wearing right now?

currentDiaperConfirm.text: Thank you for telling me!\nI'll be sure to keep that in mind!

registerFinish.text: I think that's all the information I need to know for now!\nFeel free to run along now, and let me know if you need anything, okay?

unRegister.text: Oh, are you leaving already?\nI hope you had a good time here!\nFeel free to come back anytime, okay?

registerAnnounce.text: *Ralsei steps in for a moment giving a gentle wave.*\nHey, kiddos, we've got a new friend joining us today!  Let's be sure to give [name] a warm welcome!

diaperReminder.text: *Oh! And don't forget to update your diaper stash!*\n\nUse the command /diaperstash to let me know what kind of diapers you have!

brandSelect.text: *Yep, it definitely looks like you need a change, kiddo.*\n\n What kind of diaper do you want to wear?

changeConfirm.text: *With the correct changing supplies on hand, Ralsei gives an inviting pat to the changing table* \n\n *Alright, let's get you changed into a fresh diaper!*

changeDeny.text: *Ralsei gives a disappointed look* \n\n*Aww, are you sure?  You're pretty wet, you know...*

change.text:
*Ralsei lays you down on the changing table, undoing your diaper and wiping you clean with a baby wipe.
He then lifts your legs up and slides a fresh diaper under you, sprinkling on some baby powder before taping it up snugly.*

*All done!  You're all clean and dry now!*

changeEnd.text: *Ralsei gives a gentle pat to your diapered rear, along with a biiiiiig hug* \n *"All done!  Run along now, kiddo!"*

check.text:
*Ralsei hooks a finger along the inside your leak guards,
observing the front of your diaper for any faded indicators* 
 
Let's see if you're wet...

dry.text:
*Ralsei gently prods a digit in your leg guards, checking for wetness.*
*He raises his eyebrows in surprise*
 
Oh! Wow, I guess you're still dry, huh?

damp.text: *Ralsei feels around for some wetness and notes any lightly faded indicators on your diaper*\n *Hmm, looks like you're a little damp, but not too bad!*

wet.text: *Ralsei gives a gentle squeeze to the front of your diaper, causing it to squish** \n *You're pretty wet!  We might want to change you soon before you leak!*

soaked.text: *Ralsei withdraws a finger from your diaper, noting the wetness on his finger as he gives a squeeze to your soggy diaper front** \n *Oh, wow, you're __soaked__!  That diaper's not going to hold any more, let's get you changed before you leak!*

leaking.text:
*Ralsei presses a finger against the front of your diaper, noting the wetness on his finger as he gives a squeeze to your soggy diaper front.
As more wetness drips down to the floor, he gives a slightly worried expression.*
*Oh, wow, you're LEAKING!
It's time to change before you leave an even bigger puddle!*

check.text: *Ralsei sniffs the air and tugs on the back of your diaper to check for any other accidents* \n *Now, let's check back here...*

clean.text: *Ralsei smiles and pats your diapered rear* \n *You're all clean back here!*

littleMessy.text: *Ralsei sniffs the air with a slight frown* \n *Hmm, looks like you had a little accident back here, huh... \n It's not too bad, we probably could wait on a change for a little bit!*

kindaMessy.text: *Ralsei's nose wrinkles** \n *Oh, wow, you're pretty messy back here!  We should probably get you changed soon!* \n *He says, giving a gentle squish to your diapered rear.*

veryMessy.text: *Ralsei's face scrunches and he pinches his nose* \n *Phew, I don't even need to check to know you're messy back here!  Come on, let's get you up on that changing table and cleaned up!*

nochange.text: *Ralsei gives a gentle pat to your diapered rear* \n *You're all clean and dry, kiddo!  No need for a change right now!*

lowpriority.text: *Ralsei gives a gentle pat to your diapered rear* \n *You're a little damp, but not too bad!  We can probably wait a little bit before we change you!*

mediumpriority.text: *Ralsei pauses for a moment, looking down at your diaper.*\n  Hmm, your diaper could probably hold a little more, but let's get you changed soon, okay?*

highpriority.text: *Ralsei looks at you with a slightly worried expression*\n *Yep, that diaper needs a change, and fast!  Let's get you up on the changing table and cleaned up!*
